item.description:
This meetup is cross-posted to Boston Happy Hour meetup and Social Fun. Meet up with us at any time.

Let's revisit our great Central Sq. summer pub crawl at our favorite places. We meet at the Asgard Pub for a refreshment.

http://www.classicirish.com/asgard-home.php

By 8:45 we transfer over to the Field Pub which has a great new outdoor patio and an ongoing low-key party atmosphere. (If rain, the indoor back room is equally fine). Seating is limited, but people just stand there at counters along the wall and mingle.

http://www.thefieldpub.com/

Then at 9:30 it's over to the Middle East corner for free live music with the local funk-rock band the Po Boyz:=

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eaubBW_mbZY

Between 9:30 and 10:00 there will be free belly dancing!

Note: The poboyz.net website says the music doesn't start until 11 PM, but that gives us time (between all 3 groups posted) to get to know each other better.

Public transit (recommended) would be take the no. 1 bus or the Red Line to Central. Parking: Green St. Parking Garage.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a blue-striped flat cap
item.name: Mini-Pub Crawl w/ free live music & belly dancing
